title: Mango chicken and rice salad bowls
ingredients: ['125g basmati rice', '250ml water', 'Mango sauce', '1 mango, peeled and chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '3 teaspoons honey', '1 tablespoon sriracha sauce', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, halved lengthwise', 'Sweetcorn salsa', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '225g sweetcorn', '75g diced red pepper', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '20g desiccated coconut', '1 avocado, sliced']
